author: nd
msg: emit and accept modern query string parameter delimiters (;).
Thus column headers no longer contain unescaped ampersands.
Reviewed by: Will Rowe, Jeff Trawick

author: trawick
msg: Fix ap_construct_url() so that it surrounds IPv6 literal address
strings with [].  This fixes certain types of redirection.

author: joes
msg: Added info on public cvs access, snapshots and list archives for apreq.

author: stas
msg: clarify that this is only needed for mod_perl 2.0's make test
